meanings.definition: A distinctive attribute or aspect of something.
meanings.sent1: Her smile is one of her best features.
meanings.sent2: The new car has many advanced features.
meanings.sent3: His love for ice cream features in every family gathering.
meanings.sent4: The painting features vibrant colors that catch the eye.
meanings.sent5: The unique feature of the phone is its long battery life.

meanings.definition: A prominent or distinctive part of a landscape or building.
meanings.sent1: The mountain's snow-capped peak is its most striking feature.
meanings.sent2: The cathedral's stained glass windows are beautiful features.
meanings.sent3: The quirky garden gnome features in every tourist photo.
meanings.sent4: The old mansion features a grand staircase that spirals up.
meanings.sent5: The waterfall is the main feature of the national park.

meanings.definition: To have as a prominent attribute or aspect.
meanings.sent1: The new software features an easy-to-use interface.
meanings.sent2: The latest model features a faster processor.
meanings.sent3: The movie features a surprise twist at the end.
meanings.sent4: The recipe features fresh herbs for added flavor.
meanings.sent5: The exhibition will feature local artists' work.
